participant_1.background:
My sister-in-law said I was a lazy bum because I never had to work, but she doesn't know that I spend my days running my family business.
The weather is not usually a factor when I am outside looking for wildlife.
I'm just trying to live my life and be myself, and I enjoy country music, tattoos, and iced tea.
I'm single and enjoy my freedom to drive around with the wind in my hair.
i love my impala.

participant_2.background:
I get to wake up early and spend time with my little brother and sister before school.
my favorite book is anne of green gables.
I want a place where I can practice my dancing.
After a long day at work, my favorite way to unwind is to watch anime and superhero shows.
I'm learning to swim and I'm doing my best.

content.text: I am great! How are you?
Doing well! I just got back from driving around with the wind in my hair.
That sounds like a lot of fun! Where did you go?
I went to the mountains and looked for wildlife.
That sounds like a great time! I wish I could go with you.
Maybe you can come with me next time!
That would be awesome! I love to go hiking and looking for wildlife.
What's your favorite type of wildlife to look for?
I love looking for deer and rabbits. I also like looking for birds.
I love seeing deer in the wild! They're so beautiful.
Yes they are! I also love to watch them run.
I'm glad we have similar interests!
Me too! I'm sure we would have a lot of fun going on hikes together.
I think we would too! Maybe we can make it a regular thing.
That would be great! I would love to go hiking with you on a regular basis.
